text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Didn’t see any Courage from you! You have accepted children in ages, infants and toddler from parents, total incompetence, corruption, attacks on protestors using Constitutional right, COVID-19 theft of equiptment from states. CLEAN YOUR OWN HOUSE!
